snippet: Brad Pitt is up for an Oscar for his role as Billy Beane in “Moneyball.” The Giants’ general manager, Jerry Reese, also has a compelling story.
abstract: Harvey Araton On Pro Football column suggests that the story of New York Giants general manager Jerry Reese, who rose from poverty to guide his team to two Super Bowls, is Hollywood material.
lead_paragraph: Brad Pitt is up for an Oscar for his role as Billy Beane in “Moneyball.” The Giants’ general manager, Jerry Reese, also has a compelling story.

headline.main: Hello, Hollywood. Need a Follow to ‘Moneyball’?
headline.print_headline: Hello, Hollywood. Need a Follow to ‘Moneyball’?
